Egg Service
Offline mode You can connect to Firebase anytime later by invoking the settings menu. No internet connection

Firebase account Cooking times (min) Firebase connection Soft-boiled eggs Medium-boiled eggs Hard-boiled eggs connected not connected
You can connect the app with a Firebase account. In this way it is possible to access the app data from different devices. Invite other users so that they can enter their favorite egg consistency on their devices.
All group members have access to the list of "egg orders". Group membership
Egg Service Members Cook eggs
